snippet: John A. Gotti, who once led the Gambino organized crime family, is believed to have been wounded in a pharmacy parking lot in Syosset, but he was not cooperating with investigators.
abstract: John A Gotti, former boss of Gambino crime family, is stabbed in the stomach over the weekend in Syosset, NY; circumstances of the stabbing remain unclear, and a law enforcement official who spoke on the condition of anonymity says Gotti is not cooperating with investigators.
lead_paragraph: John A. Gotti, who once led the Gambino organized crime family, is believed to have been wounded in a pharmacy parking lot in Syosset, but he was not cooperating with investigators.

headline.main: Ex-Mob Boss Gotti Stabbed on Long Island
headline.print_headline: Former Mob Boss Is Stabbed in Belly
